description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. P3 is an intense twin-stick shooter where you pilot your nano-ship inside a petri dish to protect the nucleus at the center from hordes of invading bacteria. Collect energy from dead bacteria to keep the nucleus powered up, and use power ups, mines, and extra lives to blast your way through 14 tough waves.
description.short: P3 is an intense twin-stick shooter where you pilot your nano-ship inside a petri dish to protect the nucleus at the center from hordes of invading bacteria. Collect energy from dead bacteria to keep the nucleus powered up, and use power ups, mines, and extra lives to blast your way through 14 tough waves.
